name: @sourcegraph/cody-agent
description: Cody JSON-RPC agent for consistent cross-editor support

scripts.build: cd .. && pnpm build && cd agent && node ./src/esbuild.mjs
scripts.build-agent-binaries: pnpm run build && cp dist/index.js dist/agent.js && pkg -t latest-linux-arm64,latest-linux-x64,latest-macos-arm64,latest-macos-x64,latest-win-x64 dist/agent.js --out-path ${AGENT_EXECUTABLE_TARGET_DIRECTORY:-dist}
